definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: hating, hatred;—abs. ´[[שׂ]]: Nu 35:20 +, cstr. [[שִׂנְאַת]] De 1:27, Pr 25:10; sf. [[שִׂנְאָתֶיךָ]] Ez Eze 35:11 (pl. [[אׂתֶיךָ]]- prob. meant, Kö:ii. 1, § 88 cf. Ol:§ 131 k, but < rd. [[שִׂנְאָֽתְךָ]] LXX Co Berthol Toy, cf. Ges:§ 91 l), etc.;—hatred (sts. opp. [[אַהֲבָה]]):

human, Nu 35:20 (P), Ez Eze 23:29, Eze 35:11, Pr 10:12, Pr 10:18, Pr 15:17, Pr 26:26, Ps 109:5, Ec 9:1, Ec 9:6; ´[[דִּבְרֵי שׂ]]: Ps 109:3; emphatic, [[שִׂנְאַת חָמָס]] Ps 25:19, ´[[תַּכְלִית שׂ]]: Ps 139:22 (against ´[[י]]:’s foes), also (of sexual revulsion) [[גְּדוֹלָה]] ´[[שׂ]]: 2Sa 13:15 (all acc. cogn.).
´[[י]]:’s hating, as vb., c. acc. pers. De 1:27, De 9:28.
